organizations.name: University of Ghana
quotes: Mrs. Mary Chinery-Hesse is the first female Chancellor of Ghana’s Premier University, the University of Ghana
A product of London University, University of Ghana, Trinity College, University of Dublin, Ireland, and the World Bank Institute

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: succeeding Late Mr. Kofi Annan, former Secretary-General of the United Nations.
she has had distinguished careers in Ghana’s Civil Service and at the United Nations.
the rank of Under Secretary-General of the United Nations.
the first African woman to attain a position of Under Secretary-General in the history of the United Nations.
On her retirement from the United Nations, Mary Chinery – Hesse was appointment as the Chief Advisor to the President of the Republic of Ghana

organizations.name: International Labour Organization
quotes: She was Deputy Director-General of the International Labour Organization in Geneva, Switzerland
the first woman to be appointed Deputy Director-General of the ILO

organizations.name: United Nations Development Program (UNDP)
quotes: She served as Resident Representative of United Nations Development Program (UNDP) and Resident Coordinator of the United Nations System in several Countries
